QuestData.Title: What The Dragons Know
QuestData.Description: There's no mistaking it - this hilt comes from a powerful, ancient weapon, but which one? I do not recognize these particular markings, but we haven't hit a dead end yet.$B$BKorialstrasz, better known as Krasus, has long been a friend to the quel'dorei and the Kirin Tor. With his vast knowledge and resources, he's certain to know something. Travel to the top of Wyrmrest Temple and seek his counsel, then report to Magister Hathorel inside Sunreaver's Sanctuary in Dalaran.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Krasus at the top of Wyrmrest Temple.
QuestData.RewardText: We must recover that book from the Silver Covenant. Without that book from Krasus, we stand little chance of solving the mystery of the sword in Icecrown or unlocking its power.

Objectives.Objective: Ask Krasus about the hilt's origins
